sentences.en: A pool of water or mud where animals go to wallow.
sentences.cn: 泥坑动物打滚所去的水塘或泥塘.

sentences.en: But old people gets online chat cannot too wallow in among them.
sentences.cn: 但老年人上网聊天不能过于沉湎其中.

sentences.en: Dogs love splashing in mud and hippos wallow in it.
sentences.cn: 狗喜欢在泥水洼里扑腾，河马则喜欢在其中打滚撒欢儿。

sentences.en: Don't just wallow in self - pity, do something about your problems!
sentences.cn: 别只是自怨自怜, 干点什么解决一下你的问题.

sentences.en: God, Let me wallow in the joyful stories of the books.
sentences.cn: 神啊, 让我沈溺于令人喜悦的书本的故事中.

sentences.en: He's really wallow in the praise of his new book.
sentences.cn: 他简直沈醉于别人对他新书的赞美中.

sentences.en: His parents are partly responsible for his wallow.
sentences.cn: 他的父母对他的堕落负有部分责任.

sentences.en: His tired mind continued to wallow in self-pity.
sentences.cn: 他疲惫的心继续沉溺于自哀自怜之中。

sentences.en: His usual pattern is to vent, wallow and then move on.
sentences.cn: 他的一贯做法是:先发泄一通, 然后设法平静下来,最后继续前进(希拉里就没这么宽宏大量).

sentences.en: I wanted only to wallow in my own grief.
sentences.cn: 我只想沉湎于自己的悲伤中。

sentences.en: Journal talk with friends, cry or punch your pillow, but don't wallow.
sentences.cn: 记录下来与朋友分享, 哭出来,扔枕头都可以, 但是不要总是如此.

sentences.en: Let us not wallow in the valley of despair.
sentences.cn: 我们不要在绝望的深谷里面沉沦.

sentences.en: She's not someone who likes to wallow in self-pity .
sentences.cn: 她不是那种喜欢自怜的人。

sentences.en: This product is on the chain after wallow puppy!
sentences.cn: 本产品是上链后可以打滚的小狗!

sentences.en: We should not wallow in the walley of despair.
sentences.cn: 我们不应该陷在绝望中不能自拔.

trans.tran_en: if an animal or person wallows, it rolls around in mud, water etc for pleasure or to keep cool
